# Planning (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|

**Granted Power:** You gain [[Extend Spell (Feat)|Extend Spell]] as a bonus feat.

**Planning Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Deathwatch (Spell)|Deathwatch]]****:** Reveals how near death subjects within 30 ft. are.

**2** **[[Augury (Spell)|Augury]]** **<sup>M F</sup>:** Learns whether an action will be good or bad.

**3** **[[Clairaudience_Clairvoyance (Spell)|Clairaudience/Clairvoyance]]****:** Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

**4** **[[Status (Spell)|Status]]****:** Monitors condition, position of allies.

**5** **[[Detect Scrying (Spell)|Detect Scrying]]****:** Alerts you to magical eavesdropping.

**6** **[[Heroes' Feast (Spell)|Heroesâ€™ Feast]]****:** Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses*.*

**7** **[[Scrying, Greater (Spell)|Scrying, Greater]]****:** As *[[Scrying (Spell)|scrying]]*, but faster and longer.

**8** **[[Discern Location (Spell)|Discern Location]]****:** Reveals exact location of creature or object.

**9** **[[Time Stop (Spell)|Time Stop]]****:** You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.
